messages.message: I have a request from a customer on how to get their “pages processed” stats - hopefully both hourly and daily - for the past 4 weeks. The client is FRB if that matters. How do they go about getting that data? Or can they?

Unless they have elastic search setup the only thing we have stored in the DB is a count of number of pages for each user since the beginning of time. `select * from latency_metrics where metric_name = "num-ocr-calls-ari"` or if you want a sum: `select SUM(float_val) from latency_metrics where metric_name = "num-ocr-calls-ari"` So you wouldn’t be able to get stats for just the past 4 weeks. It might be worth saving a number now, so that in 4 weeks time, you can subtract the total to get an approximate idea for their usage? In fact it might be worthwhile to periodically poll them for this so we can have this number on hand.
